faq.question: How can I book my slot for an anniversary shoot?
faq.answer: Booking your slot is simple! Just reach out to us directly using the contact information provided below, and our team will assist you in scheduling your memorable anniversary experience.

faq.question: How much do your anniversary shoot packages cost?
faq.answer: Our anniversary shoot packages are designed to suit various needs and budgets, ranging from 10,000 to 19,000 INR. We ensure that each package offers excellent value for capturing your special moments.

faq.question: What services do you offer for anniversary shoots?
faq.answer: At Pixxel City, we offer comprehensive anniversary shoot services. Our packages include beautiful setups, a wide variety of props, and custom costumes meticulously curated to match your chosen themes.

faq.question: What are the clauses for payment when booking an anniversary shoot?
faq.answer: To confirm your booking, we require an upfront payment of 50%, with the remaining 50% due upon your arrival. This ensures a hassle-free experience and secures your preferred time slot.

faq.question: Do you offer any discounts on anniversary shoot packages?
faq.answer: Yes, we do offer special discounts on anniversary shoot packages, exclusively available in our advanced packages. For more details on this offer, please feel free to reach out to us directly at +91 6261180073.

faq.question: What are your policies regarding refunds and cancellations?
faq.answer: Our policy allows for changes in booking dates, subject to availability on alternate days. Unfortunately, we do not offer refunds, but we’re happy to accommodate rescheduling whenever possible.

faq.question: How far in advance should I book my anniversary shoot with Pixxel City?
faq.answer: To secure the preferred slot for your anniversary shoot with Pixxel City, we recommend booking as far in advance as possible. Our limited availability means that booking early ensures you’ll have a confirmed spot for your special day.

faq.question: What happens if the weather is unfavorable on the day of the anniversary shoot?
faq.answer: Don’t worry! At Pixxel City, we’ve got you covered. We have a diverse range of indoor options available to ensure that your anniversary shoot proceeds smoothly, regardless of the weather conditions.

faq.question: Are props and costumes included in the anniversary shoot packages?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide a wide array of props and costumes for your anniversary shoot, all available on a sharing basis. However, any damage caused to the props or costumes will be the responsibility of the client.

faq.question: Can we bring our own props and costumes for the shoot?
faq.answer: While we encourage clients to bring their own sets of costumes, we also offer complementary options based on availability. However, bringing your own props ensures that your shoot reflects your unique style and personality.

faq.question: How long does an anniversary shoot typically last?
faq.answer: An anniversary shoot typically lasts around 6 to 12 hours, depending on the location, number of outfit changes, and desired shots.

faq.question: Do you provide any other amenities for anniversary shoot clients?
faq.answer: Yes, we do provide changing and makeup rooms for our anniversary shoot clients. These amenities are included in our bookings. If additional rooms are required, they can be arranged upon availability for an extra charge.

faq.question: Can I customize my anniversary shoot according to my preferences?
faq.answer: Thank you for your inquiry. At this time, we don’t offer customization options for anniversary shoots. Our packages are designed to provide a consistent and high-quality experience for all our clients. However, we’re confident you’ll love the options available within our existing packages. If you have any questions about our offerings, feel free to ask!
